property.name: createMetadataItemQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.metadata ( entity_id, entity_class, data) VALUES ( :ENTITY_ID, :ENTITY_CLASS, to_jsonb(:DATA::jsonb))

property.name: uploadMetadataItemQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.metadata SET data = to_jsonb(:DATA::jsonb) WHERE entity_id = :ENTITY_ID AND entity_class = :ENTITY_CLASS

property.name: uploadMetadataItemKeyQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.metadata SET data = jsonb_set(data, @KEY@, @VALUE@, true) WHERE entity_id = :ENTITY_ID AND entity_class = :ENTITY_CLASS

property.name: loadMetadataItemQuery
property.value: SELECT entity_id, entity_class, data FROM pipeline.metadata WHERE entity_id = ? AND entity_class = ?

property.name: loadMetadataItemsQuery
property.value: SELECT entity_id, entity_class, data FROM pipeline.metadata AS m WHERE (m.entity_id, m.entity_class) IN (@ENTITIES@)

property.name: loadMetadataItemsWithIssuesQuery
property.value: SELECT CASE WHEN m.entity_id IS NULL THEN i.entity_id ELSE m.entity_id END, CASE WHEN m.entity_class IS NULL THEN i.entity_class ELSE m.entity_class END, m.data, count(i.issue_id) AS issues_count FROM pipeline.metadata AS m FULL OUTER JOIN issue AS i ON i.entity_id = m.entity_id AND i.entity_class = m.entity_class WHERE (m.entity_id, m.entity_class) IN (@ENTITIES@) OR (i.entity_id, i.entity_class) IN (@ENTITIES@) GROUP BY m.entity_id, m.entity_class, m.data, i.entity_id, i.entity_class

property.name: deleteMetadataItemQuery
property.value: DELETE FROM pipeline.metadata WHERE entity_id = ? AND entity_class = ?

property.name: deleteMetadataItemKeyQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.metadata SET data = data - @KEY@ WHERE entity_id = :ENTITY_ID AND entity_class = :ENTITY_CLASS

property.name: searchMetadataByClassAndKeyValueQuery
property.value: SELECT m.entity_id, m.entity_class FROM pipeline.metadata m WHERE m.entity_class = ? AND m.data @> CAST(? AS jsonb)
